definitions.text: Venezuelan master terrorist raised by a Marxist-Leninist father; trained and worked with many terrorist groups (born in 1949)
(astrology) a person who is born while the sun is in Taurus
a zodiacal constellation in the northern hemisphere near Orion; between Aries and Gemini
the second sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about April 20 to May 20
